original_title: One Man, Six Wives and Twenty-Nine Children
overview: First produced in 1999, One Man, Six Wives and 29 Children tells the revealing and surreal story of a practicing polygamist who lives with his large brood in the middle of a Utah desert. The filmmakers document the family's daily existence, and probe the controversial aspects of the fundamentalist Mormon faith which define their way of life.
title: One Man, Six Wives and Twenty-Nine Children
